subject: Re: Order #SSN4997 confirmed
description_text:
Hello! I just had two questions- one, I just want to confirm that my order
includes the VAM motors, and two I was wondering if I could change my color
selection black instead of silver?

I rushed through my purchase because I was excited :)

Excited to receive them even if they’re silver!

Thank you!

Cory
